values:
Such a fun little game of hide and seek. 

Maybe I'll go play with the apocalypse-bringer and start my own little game of it...

Sebastian, pet, have you found yourself yet?
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/4019.html

I really hate that slayer :(

She took my doll away....
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/3631.html

Is anyone missing a witch?

<lj-cut text="Sebastian">
Sorry if I gave you a fright, pet. After Angel played a nasty trick on me and took my plaything, I met up with an old friend. She tried to follow me home, so I brought her to an old warehouse to play. I must be quiet though, because she's sleeping, and I don't want to wake the precious thing. 

I'm certain you can think of a good use for her, love.
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/3461.html

<lj-cut text="Angel">
My terms or nothing, daddy. The stars carry news, and they say you'd better be good, else the skies could open and take the slayer back from whence she once came.

I shall come to you at the time we are to meet. Have no worries, the toy comes with me, but you shall not be able to touch it. That much has been seen to.
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/3322.html

The sun's voice is louder than all the the other stars combined. We had a talk today the sun and I. It told me that the Slayer's friends are in chaos and their relationships break like glass. Shattered pieces lie everywhere and they cut themselves and bleed. 

<lj-cut text="Spike and Angel">
How much is a Slayer's soul worth? 

Think about it and let me know by sunset Friday. 

Until then, I'll be busy dancing in the singing sunshine.</lj-cut>
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/3001.html

I was awoken this morning by an evil little pixie whispering in my ear. The twins Chaos and Confusion will be here soon. Old friends...now enemies...battles arise and the losers push the daisies until they stretch their petals to the sky..

The Slayer is awake...she will come to play again...This time light will bathe all that is outside...but inside is blacker than night...

----------------------------------------------------

<lj-cut text="Sebastian">
The spell is done...the pretty little toy gets to stay with us...
</lj-cut>
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/2750.html
I still prefer the dark. The sun is too glaring. It blocks the brilliance of the stars and they all go quiet.
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/2444.html

Witches taste better than I remember...

But I kept my word like a good girl. I didn't kill her. The game wouldn't be as fun, anyway...
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/2258.html

Company comes for dinner...we should roll out the welcome mat...

Perhaps she'd be interested in seeing my pretty new toy...since the Slayer came to visit, it's been glowing like a little nightlight...
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/1814.html

The was a lot of fun...I love the sound of a Slayer's screams...

I have a pretty new toy, and Spike and Angel have a pretty little present waiting for them...

Now she can see what it feels like to be like us.
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/1631.html

The Slayers are nearby...I can feel them.

I think it's time to go play with some old friends.
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/1444.html

Spike and Angelus won't come play, so I've found someone who will. I'm all ready for the party now. I even found an appropriate dress. 

Blood red, to match the decorations.
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/1227.html

The place isn't so far off anymore. I would have gotten there sooner, but I got hungry. I dined on a little flower girl. She smelled of roses. Just like the ones in the garden Angelus gave me in Sunnydale. 

I'm going to have to find a new garden now. One with belladonna and wolfsbane and bloodroot. A pretty little garden just for me.
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/926.html

I returned to Sunnydale to get my bird...but there's a big hole and she won't sing to me anymore. Everyone was gone and the city fell down. A creature rose from the ashes and whispered in my ear. It told me where my Spike has gone. Angelus too. There's a big party in Cleveland and nobody invited ME...Spike and Angelus are no fun anymore. I hate that Slayer. I'd better go find a pretty dress, I've got to look my prettiest when I get to the party...
http://starsneednames.livejournal.com/513.html
